title: Wall Street Breakfast January 2: Stocks Skid Into 2019 With Slowdown Fears
author: Seeking Alpha

description: Our top stories today: Stocks skid into 2019 with slowdown fears; Trump/Democrats at an impasse over border wall funding; and drugmakers hike prices to kick-off 2019. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
